main event: Mr. & Mrs. A. A. McKim reported sighting an unidentified aerial phenomenon in Franklin, Ohio on May 22, 1964, between 1900 and 1915.
interesting points: The duration of the observation was approximately 2 minutes and 30 seconds, Observers described the object appearing bright in color, The sighting occurred during clear sky conditions, The object reportedly moved without sound and then disappeared, Mr. & Mrs. McKim indicated that they closely watched the object during the sighting.
